developer_settings_alert.body: Do you want to enable the developer settings? Only do this if you know what you're doing and you don't mind cleaning up your mess.
developer_settings_alert.title: Dev Settings Menu

Announcements.noAnnouncements: There are currently no active announcements

errors.location_invalid_string: Enter the number on the handout at your table.
errors.telegramHandle_invalid_string: This does not look like a valid Telegram handle.

ArtistsAlley.explanation_edit_change: You can change your Artist Alley table registration details here. Just update your information, select a picture, and submit it.
ArtistsAlley.explanation_edit_new: You haven't registered at a table in the Artist Alley yet, but you can change that here and now. Just pick a free table to set up at, enter the necessary information, select a picture, and submit it.
ArtistsAlley.explanation_status_accepted: Your registration has been reviewed and was accepted. If you want to register again at a later time and a new table, please make a new request below.
ArtistsAlley.explanation_status_pending: Your registration is being reviewed. If you made a mistake, you can edit your information.
ArtistsAlley.explanation_status_rejected: Your registration has been reviewed and was rejected. You can make a new request and try again.
ArtistsAlley.explanation_unauthorized: You currently cannot register at a table in the Artist Alley, which is only open to registered and checked-in attendees of the convention.
ArtistsAlley.intro: The Artist Alley provides a welcoming, creative, and safe environment for all artists and attendees. With the form below, artists can register when setting up at a table in the Artist Alley and make their presence there known to attendees.
ArtistsAlley.learn_more: Learn more about the Artist Alley
ArtistsAlley.location_placeholder: Table number from handout on the table
ArtistsAlley.no_submission: You haven't submitted a registration yet.

review.explanation_status_accepted: This registration has already been accepted by you or another team member.
review.explanation_status_pending: The registration has not been reviewed yet. Verify the data and accept or reject it with the options below.
review.explanation_status_rejected: This registration has already been rejected by you or another team member.

status.Pending: The registration is waiting to be approved.

review.title: Review registration request

ArtistsAlley.short_description_placeholder: Information about you and what you will be offering

status.Pending: Your registration is waiting to be approved.

ArtistsAlley.submission_image_placeholder: Click to select a picture of your table and wares
ArtistsAlley.submit_failed: Something went wrong, please try again later.
ArtistsAlley.submit_succeeded: Thank you! Your registration was received.
ArtistsAlley.title: Artist Alley Registration
ArtistsAlley.unauthorized_not_attending: Please ensure that you have a valid registration for this year's convention if you wish to register at a table in the Artist Alley.
ArtistsAlley.unauthorized_not_checked_in: Please check in and pick up your convention badge at the Registration Desk before trying to register at an Artist Alley table.
ArtistsAlley.unauthorized_not_logged_in: You need to log in before you can register at a table in the Artist alley.

Countdown.after_event: That was it! We hope to see you again next year!

Dealer.dealer_was_updated: Dealer was updated since your last visit
Dealer.in_after_dark: Located in the after dark section
Dealer.token_placeholder: The JWT or Oryx token to set

Dealers.favorites_empty: You do not have any favorite dealers yet. Favorite some dealers to create your own list.
Dealers.section_notice: Dealer grouping is picked by the app based on most unique category

Event.event_was_updated: Event was updated since your last visit
Event.mask_required: Face masks are mandatory for this event

EventFeedback.disabled_not_logged_in: Please log in to give feedback
EventFeedback.explanation: Let us know how you felt about {{ eventTitle }} by leaving us a rating and maybe even a message! We'll see that it gets forwarded to the right person.
EventFeedback.message_placeholder: Do you have any more specific feedback for your host(s)? Type it here.
EventFeedback.rating_title: How much did you like this event?
EventFeedback.submit_failed: Something went wrong during submitting. Please try again . . .
EventFeedback.thank_you: Thanks for letting us know how you felt about {{ eventTitle }}.

Events.events_hidden_subtitle: {{count}} events, reveal them again in Settings
Events.favorites_subtitle: You will receive a reminder about these events
Events.schedule_empty: You do not have any favorite events yet. Favorite some events to create your own schedule.
Events.today_schedule_subtitle: You will receive a reminder before this event starts
Events.upcoming_subtitle: These events are starting in the next 30 minutes

Home.different_timezone: Your device is set to a different time zone ({{deviceTimeZone}}) than that of {{convention}} ({{conTimeZone}}).
Home.sync_error: There was an issue with getting the data, please try again later.

warnings.favorites_changed_subtitle: Some of your favorites were updated since you last viewed them
warnings.no_image_caching: Your device cannot cache images. Without an internet connection, images will not be shown.
warnings.no_notifications: Your device does not support scheduled notifications. You will not receive reminders about upcoming events.
warnings.no_push_notifications: Your device does not support push notifications. You will not be automatically notified of Announcements or Private Messages.
warnings.subtitle: Due to your device some functionality might not work
warnings.title: Device Issues

Menu.not_logged_in: You are currently not logged in.

Notification.private_message: You received a new private message

Profile.login_description: Being logged in allows {{conName}} to send you personal messages. It also allows you to participate in the Fursuit Catch 'em All and check in at tables in the Artist Alley.
Profile.not_logged_in: You are currently not logged in

RevealHidden.lead: Click on any event to reveal it in the overview again
RevealHidden.title: Reveal specific event

Settings.allowAnalytics: Allow us to collect analytics events
Settings.allowAnalyticsSubtitle: By allowing us to collect analytics we can improve the functioning of the app. Analytics is provided by Firebase and is not shared with any other third parties

theme.description: Configure the way the app looks. When set to System it will follow the general system theme. By changing it you can keep the app in your preferred theme.
